name: Up to the Moon!
description:
Become a rocket and avoid obstacles along your way!

COSTUMES!

You can go to the costumes section and dress up as a jetplane, OR change your rocket color!

REVIEWS! (This is all a joke)"this game made me finally go owtside" - Big fat redhead.

"Terrible mechanics, glitchy bugs, no explanation needed." - IGN (2/10) (obviously a joke, learn how to take a joke!)

NOTE!

Like any other game, there are some bugs in the game! Here are ONE that I cannot fix:

1. UNPLAYABLE BUG - happens when you die

during a game. (Restart the game to fix this issue)

HOWEVER,  there are bugs that don't really affect the gameplay much:

1. BANANA AS DEFAULT ROCKET SKIN BUG - 

Always guaranteed to happen. (Simply change the costume)

2. COSTUMES BACKGROUND BUG - happens if you die during the game. If you do, a rocket may appear in the costumes menu. The background may become wack later for some reason (overlapping) (Doesn't really affect anything, except for the "unplayable bug".)
